channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Using Active Accessibility to find out where the focus item is】使用 Active Accessibility 找出焦点项目在哪里
item.description: 【Last time, we learned how to use Active Accessibility to find the caret, but what if the focus is not on an edit control? In that case, we want to find the focus object. GUITHREA】上次，我们学习了如何使用 Active Accessibility 来查找插入符，但是如果焦点不在编辑控件上怎么办？在这种情况下，我们想要找到焦点对象。吉斯瑞亚

item.title: 【Using Active Accessibility to find out where the Windows caret is】使用 Active Accessibility 找出 Windows 插入符号的位置
item.description: 【Last time, we learned how to query the global caret position, but we found that it works only for programs that use the system caret. Fancy programs think that the system caret is old and stodgy and prefer t】上次，我们学习了如何查询全局插入符位置，但我们发现它仅适用于使用系统插入符的程序。花哨的程序认为系统插入符是旧的、古板的，并且更喜欢

item.title: 【Secure and Intelligent: Queryable Encryption and Vector Search in MongoDB EF Core Provider】安全且智能：MongoDB EF Core Provider 中的可查询加密和矢量搜索
item.description: 【This is a guest post by Rishit Bhatia and Luce Carter. Rishit is a Senior Product Manager at MongoDB focusing on the .NET Developer Experience and worked hands-on with C# for many years before moving into Product Management. Luce is a Senior Developer Advocate at MongoDB, Microsoft MVP, and lover of code, sunshine, and learning. Th】这是 Rishit Bhatia 和 Luce Carter 的客座文章。 Rishit 是 MongoDB 的高级产品经理，专注于 .NET 开发人员体验，在进入产品管理领域之前，他在 C# 方面进行了多年的实践工作。 Luce 是 MongoDB 的高级开发人员倡导者、Microsoft MVP，也是代码、阳光和学习的爱好者。钍

item.title: 【How can I find out where the Windows caret is?】如何找到 Windows 插入符号的位置？
item.description: 【A customer was looking for a way to find the location of the caret (the blinking line that indicates where the next character will be inserted). They tried Get­Caret­Pos, but it always failed. Most window manager state functions that were global in 16-bit Windows became per-thread in 32-bit Windows, as part of the con】一位客户正在寻找一种方法来查找插入符的位置（指示下一个字符将插入的位置的闪烁线）。他们尝试了 GetCaretPos，但总是失败。大多数在 16 位 Windows 中全局的窗口管理器状态函数在 32 位 Windows 中变成了每个线程，作为 con 的一部分

item.title: 【XAML Studio is now Open Sourced】XAML Studio 现已开源
item.description: 【XAML Studio Open Sourced It's been over 8 years since what became XAML Studio was started. And from nearly the beginning, it was always envisioned as an open-source project… So, it's with great pleasure that I'm happy to announce that day has finally come!】XAML Studio 开源 自 XAML Studio 启动以来，已经有 8 年多了。几乎从一开始，它就一直被设想为一个开源项目……所以，我很高兴地宣布这一天终于到来了！
